mysql	c16f24f908846019a741db580f6545a5933e9435a7cf1579c50794a6ca287739	SELECT COALESCE(`schema_name`, ''), COALESCE(`digest`, ''), COALESCE(`digest_text`, ''), `count_star`, `sum_timer_wait`, `query_sample_text` FROM performance_schema.events_statements_summary_by_digest WHERE `last_seen` >= NOW() - INTERVAL 60 second AND ((`digest_text` NOT LIKE 'EXPLAIN %' AND `digest_text` NOT LIKE '/* otel-collector-ignore */%') OR `digest_text` IS NULL) ORDER BY `count_star` DESC LIMIT 1000	6	1021919000	SELECT @@session.transaction_read_only
